meanings.definition: A cosmetic product used to add shine and color to the lips.
meanings.sent1: She always carries her favorite lipglosses in her purse.
meanings.sent2: I bought three new lipglosses at the store today.
meanings.sent3: Her collection of lipglosses could rival a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The city lights reflected in her lipglosses like tiny stars.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of her lipglosses lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: The act of applying lipgloss to enhance the appearance of the lips.
meanings.sent1: Her quick lipglosses before the party made her lips sparkle.
meanings.sent2: The makeup artist's lipglosses always looked flawless.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at multiple lipglosses ended up in a sticky situation.
meanings.sent4: With each stroke of lipglosses, her confidence grew.
meanings.sent5: The mirror reflected her smile as she applied her lipglosses.
